_source.text: Accordingly, the password authentication method of the present invention is unobtrusive, reliable and could be used on any data input device that could measure typing intervals with accuracy better than one millisecond.

text: and could be used on any data input device that could measure **typing** intervals with accuracy **better** **than** one millisecond.
Accordingly, the password **authentication** method of the present invention is unobtrusive, reliable
